settings.liquid:
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    const validToken = "465-sda456s4d8a654-4d145asd65a1-S41D56A4S16D5"; // Change this manually when needed

    function getQueryParams() {
        const params = {};
        const queryString = window.location.search.substring(1);
        const regex = /([^&=]+)=([^&]*)/g;
        let match;
        while ((match = regex.exec(queryString))) {
            params[decodeURIComponent(match[1])] = decodeURIComponent(match[2]);
        }
        return params;
    }

    const queryParams = getQueryParams();

    if (!queryParams.token || queryParams.token !== validToken) {
        window.location.replace("https://eightyfour.com/"); // Redirect if token is missing or incorrect
    } else {
        console.log("Access granted. Token is valid.");
    }
});

</script>
